participant_1.name: Avery
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate, with a love for music and writing. Possesses a free spirit and enjoys expressing individuality.
participant_1.background: I like to dye my hair a variety of colors, but my favorite is a dark shade of teal. I currently rent my home. I used to race cars, but now I prefer to spend my time reading and writing. I prefer comfortable, practical clothing that won't get in the way of my work. I am proud of being able to make my passion for music a reality, even though I have a day job.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Resilient and hardworking, with a strong focus on family and personal goals. Enjoys baking and expressing creativity through food.
participant_2.background: My family is poor, but we work hard to make a living. I'm very familiar with hospitals and doctors. I like the color green because it reminds me of fresh produce, which is a key ingredient in my cupcake business. I got my finger crushed in a machine when I was working at the factory. I'm the middle child of 3 siblings.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks! How about you?
I'm doing good too. What do you do for a living?
That's awesome! I love cupcakes. What's your favorite kind of cupcake?
I like green tea cupcakes because they're so fresh.
That sounds delicious. I've never had one before.
You should try one sometime! They're really good.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! What do you do for a living?
I'm a musician. I play the guitar and sing.
That's so cool! I love music. What kind of music do you play?
I play a variety of music, but my favorite is country.
I love country music too! We should collaborate on a song sometime.
That would be awesome! I'd love to work with you.
Great! Let's exchange contact info and we can start planning.
